fr.inria.atlanmod.commons.primitive

Class Bytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.commons.primitive.Bytes

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Bytes
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility methods related to byte arrays.

    • Method Summary

      Decodes a byte array to a boolean.

      Decodes a byte array to a long.

      Decodes a byte array to a short.
      static java.lang.String toString(byte[] bytes)
      Decodes a byte array to a String.
      static java.lang.String toStringBinary(byte[] bytes)
      Decodes a byte array to a String that contains each byte, in order, as a two-digit unsigned hexadecimal number in lower case.

        Decodes a byte array to a boolean.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array to decode
        Returns:
        a boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the bytes is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the bytes.length is different from 1

      • toStringBinary

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.String toStringBinary(byte[] bytes)
        Decodes a byte array to a String that contains each byte, in order, as a two-digit unsigned hexadecimal number in lower case.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array to decode
        Returns:
        a String
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the bytes is null
        See Also:
